document.topic_text: 4/17/2002 | 7 posts Richard Caldwell Jr. Richard Caldwell Jr. is the Pastor-Teacher at Founders Baptist Church. Richard and his wife Jacque have been married for 24 years and have four children, Richard III, Amber, Christopher and Reagan.
